Author: D2D privacyalternatives.com#5667
Content:
For people who follow KMD, it's easy to understand there's great tech behind it. 

But it doesn't have a strong , unique  identity and memes like ARRR has for example, or even RVN. 

Also the Komodo website still having a message at the top saying it's an interim site, after months, doesn't help, it would be better to take that "under construction" message off completely. 

I think the Lizard UI for easily creating blockchains, similarly to the one Ravencoin have, would really help. I heard about it quite a while ago and after that there have been no more news. Just my thoughts.

Author: actionslacks#4072
Content: Pirate has a much simpler mission. I think the main thing to look at is scope.  kmd is doing everything. smart contracts, dex, multicoin/multiprotocol wallet. It's a different beast than RVN entirely. putting it all in a package and putting a neat little bow on it is a challenge. Still too much hype and too little real usage for kmd to show it's value. One could view ARRR's success as a testament to the power of kmd however.
